name: Prerequisites checklist
description: Inputs to settle before provisioning APIM and onboarding APIs.
checklist: Identity model: Azure AD (users/groups), managed identity usage, certificate strategy.
Connectivity: public vs private endpoints, VNet integration needs, DNS plan, inbound/outbound paths.
Observability: Application Insights and/or Log Analytics targets, retention and access requirements.
Automation: IaC baseline (Bicep/Terraform), CI/CD approach for APIs and policies.
Governance: naming, tagging, environment strategy (dev/test/prod), and RBAC roles.
nextSteps: Decide which parts of APIM configuration are authored as code (APIs, products, policies, named values).
If private connectivity is required, define the DNS + network prerequisites before choosing SKU.
